ygData.subject: Re: Places to get the heck out of 35?
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the best places I went for Safe EXP was in the basement, hunting the Ghost in unrest. There is no chance of a train unless you make it and the loot
ygData.messageBody:
One of the best places I went for Safe EXP was in the basement, hunting the
Ghost in unrest. There is no chance of a train unless you make it and the loot
isn't too bad with jagged bands and DW boots being dropped occasionally. Being a
Cleric you are naturally in demand down there. Even at 35 you gain EXP pretty
fast there ,depending on group make-up of course.

Saren
Cleric of the 40th circle
Karana





David Bradshaw wrote:

> From: "David Bradshaw" <Logain@...>
>
> I have been stuck on level 35 for years now... (ok a slight exageration..)
> Someone told me that the specs in Feerrot was a good spot to get out of this
> level... I just spent 4 hours in Kith with a group and only got 25% of a
> bbl. We where fighting many different things including reds...
>
> A few ppl in my group told me they ended up having to solo to get out of
> this level with any type of speed...
>
> Any insight would be appreciated.
>
> Thump Ghoulsbane
> 35th Cleric of the Underfoot
>
>
